name: Glass Cannon (Cosmo48)
description:
Welcome to Glass Cannon!

This is my submission for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam. This combines the fast-paced action of a top-down arcade game with the strategy of an RPG. Pick your unique combination of 5 different and unique abilities and fight evil aliens. One shot will take you down, you are a glass cannon after all! This is my first ever solo project and it's a little rough around the edges but I'm happy on what I was able to accomplish in under 48 hours. Feedback is much appreciated!

Thanks for Playing! Controls

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

WASD - Movement Keys

LShift. E, Right Mouse Button - Ability Keys
